data.name: Beacon of the Reed Sea
data.passiveDescription: After the character’s Elemental Skill hits an opponent, their ATK will be increased by {{20//25//30//35//40%}} for 8s. After the character takes DMG, their ATK will be increased by {{20//25//30//35//40%}} for 8s. The 2 aforementioned effects can be triggered even when the character is not on the field. Additionally, when not protected by a shield, the character’s Max HP will be increased by {{32//40//48//56//64%}}.
